dataset.identifier: urn:uuid:Strengthening Mobility and Revolutionizing Transportation (SMART) Program
dataset.title: SMART Grant DriveArizona Connected Vehicle Datasets (BSM & PSM)
dataset.description: Connected vehicle datasets collected via the DriveAZ iOS application, routed through DRIVEAZ-MSGROUTER, stored on CyVerse, and analyzed within driveAZ_Analytics. Includes Basic Safety Messages (BSM) in Parquet format and Personal Safety Messages (PSM) in JSON Lines, each with machine-readable data dictionaries.

publisher.name: Arizona Commerce Authority / City of Phoenix

dataset.spatial: Phoenix Metro Area (select intersections and vehicle travel points)
dataset.rights: Sample research dataset; ensure privacy review before broader release. Attribution (TASL): Title — SMART Grant DriveArizona (BSM/PSM); Author — Arizona Commerce Authority / City of Phoenix; Source — https://de.cyverse.org/data/ds/iplant/home/shared/DriveArizona/logs; License — CC BY 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

distribution.title: BSM Parquet (CyVerse)
distribution.description: BSM records stored as Parquet objects in CyVerse storage.

distribution.title: PSM JSONL (CyVerse)
distribution.description: PSM records stored as JSON Lines in CyVerse storage.

distribution.title: DriveArizona logs folder (CyVerse)
distribution.description: Top-level folder in CyVerse for DriveArizona logs (BSM/PSM).

distribution.title: BSM Data Dictionary
distribution.description: Machine-readable data dictionary for BSM Parquet fields.

distribution.title: PSM Data Dictionary
distribution.description: Machine-readable data dictionary for PSM JSONL fields.
